title: Ulaire Otsea, Lieutenant of Morgul (1U235)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Wraith
Twilight:	4
Card Type:	Minion • Nazgul
Strength:	9
Vitality:	3

Game Text:	Shadow: Exert Ulaire Otsea to make a [Wraith] minion fierce until the regroup phase.

Rarity:	U
